channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- About Author Box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- About Author Box

item.title: CVE-2021-24745|2024-08-03T19:42:16.657Z -- unknown -- about%20author%20box
item.description: The About Author Box WordPress plugin before 1.0.2 does not sanitise and escape the Social Profiles field values before outputting them in attributes, which could allow user with a role as low as contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
